meta.label: Download Tableau Dashboard
meta.description: This recipe downloads a Tableau dashboard into a folder

outputRoles.name: output_folder
outputRoles.label: Output Folder
outputRoles.description: This is the folder where the downloaded Tableau dashboard view content will be saved

params.name: server_url
params.label: Tableau Base Server URL
params.description: This is URL of the Tableau Server. For example: https://us-west-2b.online.tableau.com/

params.name: api_version
params.label: Tableau REST API Version. Example: 3.16
params.description: This is the REST API version that matches with your Tableau Server version.

params.name: site_id
params.label: Tableau Site ID
params.description: This is Tableau site ID. For example: site_id in tableau_server_url/#/site/site_id/views

params.name: view_id
params.label: View ID
params.description: This is the view ID, for example: 37b94338-5aa3-4887-82c7-b355e6ac3525

params.name: username
params.label: Username
params.description: This is the username used to login into the Tableau Server

params.name: password
params.label: Password
params.description: This is the password used to login into the Tableau Server

params.name: token_name
params.label: Token Name
params.description: This is the Token Name used for authentication into the Tableau Server

params.name: filter
params.description: A list of key,value pairs to be used for filtering the view data or dashboard
